introduction: For seven years, Yun Seo-rin has given everything to her billionaire husband and their daughter. On her birthday, she discovers they are celebrating her husband's half-sister instead of her. Realizing she has been abandoned, Seo-rin quietly prepares for divorce and withdraws from both the family and the company. Only then do they understand the depth of what they've lost. Cast aside by both her love and her family, Seo-rin is determined to reclaim her dignity and her life.
